body_html: I don't think the variance thing should be counted as a bug. That is the default initialization of linear layers, and is a commonly used one. We also provide a wide range of other initialization methods, which users are free to choose from if they want.

body: I don't think the variance thing should be counted as a bug. That is the default initialization of linear layers, and is a commonly used one. We also provide a wide range of other initialization methods, which users are free to choose from if they want.
